mapper.select: SELECT `id` ,`name` ,`author` ,`publisher` ,`publishDate` ,`imagePath` ,`isbn` ,`page` ,`state` ,`info` ,`categoryId` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `book` WHERE `name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR `author` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') OR `info` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
SELECT `id` ,`name` ,`author` ,`publisher` ,`publishDate` ,`imagePath` ,`isbn` ,`page` ,`state` ,`info` ,`categoryId` ,`createdAt` ,`updatedAt` FROM `book` ORDER BY `createdAt` DESC LIMIT 4;
